metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:  Ingredients : o 2 cups black-eyed peas o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying  Instructions : o Soak black-eyed peas overnight, then peel and rinse. o Blend peas with diced onion, minced garlic, and salt until smooth. o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm. Agedashi Tofu  Ingredients : o 1 block tofu o 1/4 cup cornstarch o 1 cup dashi broth o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 1 tablespoon mirin o 1/4 cup green onions o 1/4 cup grated daikon  Instructions : o Cut tofu into cubes and coat with cornstarch. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Heat dashi broth with soy sauce and mirin. o Serve tofu in broth, topped with green onions and grated daikon. Aloo Gobi  Ingredients : o 2 potatoes o 1 cauliflower o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon salt o 2 tablespoons oil  Instructions : o Peel and dice potatoes, cut cauliflower into florets. o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.
